text: Hans Verhagen (3 March 1939 - 10 April 2020) was a Dutch journalist, poet, painter and filmmaker. He was born in Vlissingen, Netherlands. He won the P. C. Hooft Award in 2009 "for his humour, his engagement, his poetic daring and whimsy."P.C. Hooft-prijs naar Hans Verhagen, NRC, 11 december 2008 Verhagen died on 10 April 2020 in Amsterdam at the age of 81.In Vlissingen geboren dichter Hans Verhagen overleden: ‘Zonder overdrijving de grootste dichter van Nederland’ ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch filmmakers Category:Dutch journalists Category:Dutch painters Category:Dutch poets Category:People from Vlissingen Category:Writers from Zeeland
title: Hans Verhagen
